descriptionHtml:
[size=5]
H E N T A I \'s   S U C C U B U S    A R M O R
[/size]

release date      : April 2012
Category          : Armor
Armor Type      : Medium
Body               : Cbbe V3  ( or Cbbe V3 M ) 
Mod version      : 1.0
Author             : Hentai

[size=10]
What\'s New
[/size]

[IMG]http://img829.imageshack.us/img829/4412/37666040.png[/IMG]




1. Leg Texture folder (use this file if you have weird leg texture problem)
   open the \\option\\Leg Texture folder
   copy the files and paste them \"\\data\\meshes\\hentai\\su\\\" and overwrite the previous files

2. No_Wings folder (use this file if you don\'t like the wings)
   open the \\option\\No_wings folder
   copy the files and paste them \"\\data\\meshes\\hentai\\su\\\" and overwrite the previous files

3. Long_Legs folder (It\'s little bit loger than default leg)
   open the \\option\\Long_Leg folder
   copy the files and paste them \"\\data\\meshes\\hentai\\su\\\" and overwrite the previous files

4. Wings_on_shoulder folder (wings are on the higher position)
   open the \\option\\Wings_on_shoulder folder
   copy the files and paste them \"\\data\\meshes\\hentai\\su\\\" and overwrite the previous files

5.6 not recommaned

And you can create the gloves at the forge




[b]
Description
[/b]
===========
Succubus Armor
Create this armor with leather and leather strips at any forge
Body part is based on Cbbe v3 M body but It works fine with Cbbe V3
If you don\'t like the wings, then open \\option folder and paste them to data\\meshes\\armo\\hentai\\Su folder, Overwrite the previous files.

Everythig I uploaded in the Nexus is newly made for Skyrim, they are not ported from my Oblivion mods
zotman12 is simply my login ID and I want you to call me \"Hentai\"
The pose I usually use is \"YAMATO POSE\"
The face Im using is my personal mods and It won\'t be released 

I usually don\'t answer to your comments but It doesn\'t means that I don\'t read your postings.
All Im concerning is introducing new styled mods as many as I can and for that reason, I don\'t give a lot of variation to my mods.
I also usually don\'t comply with people\'s request but I want you to know this.
The simpler I try to make my mods the more mods I can show you.

[b]
Enjoy Hentai Style
[/b]

Contents
========
1 Torso dress
1 Boots
1 gloves


Install
=======
Extract the archive. Take the folders \"meshes\", \"textures\" and paste them in your Skyrim/Data folder. 


Uninstall
=========
Delete Folder
Skyrim\\Data\\Meshes\\armor\\Hentai\\Su
Skyrim\\Data\\textures\\armor\\Hentai\\Su

Delete ESP file 
Skyrim\\Data\\hentaiSuccubusArmor.esp


Credits
=======
Thanks to Bethesda for the best games.
Caliente  :   Calientes Female Body Mod Big Bottom Edition -CBBE-
MAK        :   CBBEv3M Body Repalacer  


Tools Used
==========
Blender
NIFSkope
Photoshop
CrazyBump


Permissions
==========
1.  Feel free to use everything in this file.

2.  Everything I made for Obliviion is free to convert to Skyrim. Since Im not going to convert them myself.
     
3. Do not upload this file on Steam Workshop until furthur notice. ( I like Nexus so much more as a modder)


Hentai Works
========
Type \"Hentai\" at the SkyNexus search tap
